name: Frame Outsiders
storyline: A girl who was imprisoned in a facility and lived a lonely life. It was an unknown spy woman who rescued her. A few years later, Sazare, who was living a peaceful life while hiding herself, one day discovers the plot of an organization called "Cycle" that abuses her supernatural powers. She becomes a spy and decides to block her plan. Sazare uses her supernatural power "Psychometry" to read her thoughts and her supernatural power "Teleport" to fly in space to take on items with strong thoughts. It was--.
summary:
"Even if I'm an outsider, my feelings deceived the world."

Steal the target using "Teleport"! Infiltrate the story in this action-adventure.
